game.title: Lost City of Eldarath
game.synopsis: In a world where ancient magic has been lost to the sands of time, the land of Eridoria is plagued by a terrible curse that threatens to destroy everything in its path. Players take on the role of an archaeologist tasked with uncovering the secrets of the Lost City of Eldarath, a fabled metropolis hidden deep within the mystical forest of Aethereia.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player's character stumbling upon an ancient map that supposedly leads to the entrance of Eldarath. As they delve deeper into the forest, they are ambushed by twisted creatures born from the corrupted magic that permeates the land. With the help of a mysterious ally, the player must fight for survival and navigate the treacherous terrain in search of the lost city.
game.ending: After overcoming countless challenges and unraveling the mysteries of Eldarath, the player discovers that the only way to lift the curse is to perform an ancient ritual that requires a terrible sacrifice. With the fate of Eridoria hanging in the balance, the player must make a choice: save the world or succumb to the darkness within. The ending cinematic shows the consequences of their decision, as the land of Eridoria teeters on the brink of destruction or begins its slow journey towards redemption.
